author: m0_ox
content: [bal v1.5.0](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v1.5.0) is out with fixes and targeted BAL tests from issues reported by revm and besu (thanks <@429719902363058177> and <@465903001156976682>) and a few more. As always, give it a run and report any glaring issues here. The python specs have been changing a bit in design but these targeted tests should help us make sure we don't see the same issues pop back up again as the design changes.
